thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.co.nz
thread.title: Deepika Kumar

author: Deepika Kumar
title: Deepika Kumar
text: I had the pleasure of dealing with Allister from Flashbay who within minutes of enquiring online, got in touch with me. I was very impressed with the amazing sample pack that was delivered the next day which helped us decide which product to choose.. He was very professional and went above and beyond to deliver exceptional customer service. The process from start to finish was really simple. Everyone loved the flash drives when they arrived and all our staff couldn't stop raving about them. I highly recommend Flashbay to anyone and we will definitely be using them again. Thanks Allister.
